name: The Sneaksta
description:
In the beginning of the story, The Great One gangster is a peaceful gangster, one day another gangster named Satan attack The Great One's Gangster territory and stolen The Great One's important files. The Great One's Boss was very angry then he send  Angelo to take revenge.

Angelo is the protagonist Character in this game, his mission is to  sneak, steal and destroy data belonging to the Satan gangsters and search for important data belonging to The Great One from the Satan gangsters.

An action game that lets you play as a gangsta to sneak inside the rivalry's bases with given objectives.

(Pictures given on the right side of the screen are the part of the pre-alpha prototype of "The Sneaksta"'s gameplay. It still uses placeholder models picked from the internet that aren't meant to be made for the later, final release)

Controller instructions (READ FIRST BEFORE PLAYING THE PRE-ALPHA):

  • D (OR RIGHT ARROW) = Move to the Right
  • A (OR LEFT ARROW) = Move to the Left
  • Space = Jump (Wall jumping TBA)
  • *To quit, press "alt+f4" or "ctrl+alt+del" then kill the process*
